content: निकृति {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Base, dishonest, wicked. --तिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Baseness, wickedness. {@--2@} Dishonesty, fraud, deception; अनिकृतिनिपुणं ते चेष्टितं मानशौंड <ls>Ve. 5. 21</ls>; <ls>Ki. 1. 45.</ls> {@--3@} Insult, offence, humiliation; <ls>Mu. 4. 11.</ls> {@--4@} Abuse' reproach. {@--5@} Rejection, removal. {@--6@} Poverty, indigence. {@--7@} The earth. {@--8@} <ab>N.</ab> of one of the eight Vasus.
